snippet: The Colombian rider Miguel Ángel Rubiano Chávez won the hilly sixth stage of the Giro d’Italia with a long breakaway, and Adriano Malori of Italy took the overall lead.
abstract: Colombian cyclist Miguel Angel Rubiano Chavez wins the hilly sixth stage of the Giro d’Italia; Italy's Adriano Malori takes the overall lead.
lead_paragraph: The Colombian rider Miguel Ángel Rubiano Chávez won the hilly sixth stage of the Giro d’Italia with a long breakaway, and Adriano Malori of Italy took the overall lead.

headline.print_headline: Colombian Wins Sixth Stage of Giro
